app_descript:
## AI Green Screen

AI Green Screen is an innovative application that utilizes cutting-edge artificial intelligence to provide seamless background removal and paint effects for your images and videos. Leveraging semantic image segmentation technology, AI Green Screen allows you to effortlessly detect objects and backgrounds in your media, enabling a host of creative effects tailored for everyday users.

### üìå Core Features
- **Automatic Object Detection**: Utilizes advanced AI to automatically identify and segment objects in images for precise background removal and effects. üñºÔ∏è
- **Versatile Effects Applications**: Choose from a variety of effects including AI painter, blurring, green screen masking, and background swapping. üé®
- **Video Editing Capabilities**: Supports frame rate control and enables background swapping with videos, perfect for creating engaging content. üé•
- **Privacy-focused Design**: Processes all images locally without cloud dependency, ensuring your data remains on your device. üîí
- **Custom Sticker Creation**: Easily create and save custom stickers for later use, compatible with messaging apps like WhatsApp. üì±

### üëç Pros
- **User-friendly Interface**: Intuitive design makes it easy to navigate and apply effects. üåü
- **High Sensitivity Options**: Offers multiple levels of object detection sensitivity for customizable editing. üö¶
- **Local Processing**: Ensures that your data is secure and processed directly on your device. üîê
- **Seamless Media Sharing**: Easily share media directly to the app from other applications. üîÑ
- **Unique AI Painting Effects**: Provides creative painting effects that are not available in other apps. üñåÔ∏è

### üëé Cons
- **Learning Curve**: Some advanced features may require a learning period for new users. üìö
- **Limited Advanced Features**: May lack extensive editing tools found in professional-grade software. üõ†Ô∏è
- **Occasional Accuracy Issues**: The AI may not always create a perfect mask or detection in complex images. ‚ùó
- **Size Constraints**: App size may take up considerable storage on your device. üì¶
- **Device Performance Dependency**: Performance may vary based on the hardware capabilities of your device. ‚öôÔ∏è

### üíµ Price
AI Green Screen is free to download with in-app purchases available for additional features.
